code: import React from'react';import{useTheme}from'../contexts/ThemeContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeToggle=()=>{const{darkMode,toggleTheme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"theme-toggle","aria-label":darkMode?"Switch to light mode":"Switch to dark mode",title:darkMode?"Switch to light mode":"Switch to dark mode",children:darkMode?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"theme-icon sun",role:"img","aria-hidden":"true",children:"\u2600\uFE0F"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"theme-icon moon",role:"img","aria-hidden":"true",children:"\uD83C\uDF19"})});};export default ThemeToggle;
